channel.title: Hit counter code for status page
channel.description:
Does anyone have a hit counter code that will work for the moparscape server status page?
Ive tried so many, but they are all for websites added in, i really need one. Thanks

item.title: Hit counter code for status page
item.dc:creator: @Tylers_Pur31 Tylers_Pur3
item.description:
@Tylers_Pur31 wrote:

That never works, because they are always html codes that dont work for the server status page
